overview: The tale of Jason Chase, played by Jason Raze, who leaves his small town life to find himself, he ends up in Las Vegas. He realizes that things are not as easy as he expected and quickly finds himself broke with no place to stay. We know what happens to boys like this on the streets. Along the way, he befriends a local web cam performer, Jesse Jacobs and soon learns what the big city has to offer.
title: Vegas Or Bust
